attributes.action: Make all big food chain such as McDonalds’ chicken and beef meat Halal
attributes.background: Food, yes food. Should that not be enjoyed by everyone? I go into McDonald’s with hunger and all I can enjoy is a fish o fillet and chips. Yes this is amazingly delicious but due to growing diversity wouldn’t it be amazing if people from all walks can enjoy more than 1/6 of the menu??

rejection.details: We can't accept your petition because this is the responsibility of McDonald's and other food chains, not the UK Government or Parliament.
